feed.title: MeTube Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for MeTube: 2025-07-27
entry.content:
• If the YTDLP_OPTIONS_FILE environment is used to load a file, it will be monitored for changes on the disk, and automatically reloaded if it changes.
  • Support for curl-cffi was added, to allow impersonating browser fingerprints.

entry.title: New release for MeTube: 2025.07.31
entry.content:
• Change versions to be dot-separated (2025.07.31) instead of dash-separated (2025-07-27) for better compatibility with semver.
  • Fix the footer to the bottom of the page.
